item.title: machinespawn
item.author: graeme@rthur.me (Graeme Arthur)
item.description:
machinespawn is a wrapper for machinectl and systemd-nspawn to creating and managing containers; primarily focused at local development environment and CI/CD with a heavy emphasis on caching.

  • Organisation: machinespawn
  • Date: October 2022 - date
  • Role: Project Lead
item.summary: Quickly stand up systemd-nspawn containers for development or CI/CD
